name: Trahere
description:
In their most desparate hour, they prayed for you to save them from the doom. You created a way out, but they must sacrifice before they can truly be saved.

Currently only playable by download with java.

Control with Arrow Keys or WASD.

  • Villages will grow slowly.
  • You can create reverence by raging in a village.
  • Reverent villages of sufficient size will sacrifice for you.
  • Those sacrifices are key to escape the doom.
  • Collect them and bring them to the meat grinder on the front of the cart. This will buy time.
  • With that time, devour as many villagers as you can, to gain strength and find a permanent solution.
  • Devouring does not happen out of free will, so it will reduce willingness to sacrifice.

"Very Low Note", "Chase Pulse" and "Chase Pulse Faster"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
